name: Alcon Laboratories,Inc
overview: Alcon Laboratories, Inc. manufactures, markets and distributes eye care products. The company offers ophthalmic pharmaceuticals, surgical equipment, and contact lenses. Its products include ophthalmic solutions and suspensions, eye drops, otic suspensions, contact lens solutions, and eye vitamins. The company also offers contact lenses and surgical devices for cataract, glaucoma, vitreoretinal, and refractive treatment. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Fort Worth, Texas. Alcon Laboratories, Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Alcon, Inc.
